title: Generating and Summarizing Explanations for Linked Data
segmentation: Talk about generating and summarizing explanations for link data first, the content.

Linked data is constantly copied, moved, integrated and in this context it's essential to provide information about the history of the data lifecycle to help users judge the trustworthiness of data and explanations.
Enable us to provide this kind of information, for example information.
About how data is obtained.
Flow of the information in the data division.
Expansions enable users to better understand the reasoning behind producing the data, which leads to better trust.
And Tim Berners Lee envisioned an Ouya button within web browsers that, when clicked on, would produce reasons why the users should trust some information.
So we follow the same line of thought.
In the.
Context of linked data where data is data.
